name: The Dingle Hole
description:
You are tasked to write a book report on dingling, a rather controversial pastime/hobby.

Do your research and send your report once you're done to get your final grade!

Good luck!

====================

PC Controls

Arrow Keys to Walk

Z to Interact / OK

X to Cancel / Menu

Mobile / Mouse Controls

Left Click / Single Tap to Walk / Interact

Right Click / 2-Finger Tap to Cancel / Menu

====================

This game was made in 48 hours for the Games Bagus Workshop & Game Jam! Sadly, due to circumstances, the game was unable to be pitched at the final day, but that doesn't mean it still can't be played!
